name: William CARMAN and Victoria Senbertrand and Mary Beth Marzulli v. ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT Of the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA and City of Philadelphia and Cottage Glen Developers, Inc. Appeal of COTTAGE GLEN DEVELOPERS, INC.
name_abbreviation: Carman v. Zoning Board of Adjustment

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. No. 701(f).
parties: William CARMAN and Victoria Senbertrand and Mary Beth Marzulli v. ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT Of the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA and City of Philadelphia and Cottage Glen Developers, Inc. Appeal of COTTAGE GLEN DEVELOPERS, INC.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. No. 701(f).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Carl S. Primavera, Bradley K. Moss, Philadelphia, for Cottage Glen Developers, Inc.
Richelle D. Hittinger, Philadelphia, for William Carman, Victoria Senbertrand and Mary Marzulli.
Cheryl L. Gaston, Philadelphia, for Zoning Board of Adjustment of the City of Philadelphia.
casebody.head_matter:
667 A.2d 214
William CARMAN and Victoria Senbertrand and Mary Beth Marzulli v. ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT Of the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA and City of Philadelphia and Cottage Glen Developers, Inc. Appeal of COTTAGE GLEN DEVELOPERS, INC.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 26, 1995.
Decided Nov. 22, 1995.
Carl S. Primavera, Bradley K. Moss, Philadelphia, for Cottage Glen Developers, Inc.
Richelle D. Hittinger, Philadelphia, for William Carman, Victoria Senbertrand and Mary Marzulli.
Cheryl L. Gaston, Philadelphia, for Zoning Board of Adjustment of the City of Philadelphia.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
